metadata.feature_description: Enables uploading of images, documents, and generic files with multipart support and automatic path generation.

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and click Add Asset button
steps.expected: Upload dialog should appear with drag-and-drop area
steps.actual: Upload dialog appeared with 'Drag and Drop a File or Select an Option' message

steps.expected: File should upload successfully with 'File uploaded' status
steps.actual: File uploaded successfully with green checkmark and 'File uploaded' status message

steps.expected: Both files should upload, with duplicate detection for existing file
steps.actual: test_image2.png uploaded successfully; test_image.jpg showed duplicate warning with Keep/Replace options

steps.expected: PDF document should upload with appropriate icon
steps.actual: PDF file uploaded showing PDF icon; Replace option was tested successfully

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Upload file with special characters in name

steps.action: Upload file named 'test file with spaces & special.txt'
steps.expected: File with spaces and special characters should upload successfully
steps.actual: File uploaded successfully - system handled spaces and ampersand (&) character correctly

steps.expected: System should reject the file with appropriate error message
steps.actual: File was correctly rejected with 'File extension not allowed.' error message and X icon

steps.expected: System should reject the file due to size limit
steps.actual: File was correctly rejected with 'File size bigger than 28. Mb' error message - system enforces 28MB limit

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Upload file with duplicate name (Keep option)

steps.action: Upload file that already exists and click 'Keep' option
steps.expected: Original file should be kept, upload should be cancelled
steps.actual: Clicking 'Keep' stopped the upload and preserved the original file - 'File upload stopped' message shown

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Upload file with duplicate name (Replace option)

steps.action: Upload PDF file that already exists and click 'Replace' option
steps.expected: Original file should be replaced with new upload
steps.actual: Clicking 'Replace' successfully replaced the file - 'File uploaded' status shown after replacement

steps.action: Verify drag-and-drop UI is present and functional
steps.expected: Drag-and-drop area should be visible and accept file drops
steps.actual: Drag-and-drop UI is present with 'Drag and Drop a File or Select an Option' message. The underlying file input accepts files and processes uploads correctly.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify uploaded files appear in Assets

steps.action: Search for uploaded test_image files in Assets browser
steps.expected: Uploaded files should appear in search results
steps.actual: Search results show test_image.jpg and other uploaded files with correct thumbnails

observations: The upload dialog provides clear visual feedback with progress bars, checkmarks for success, and X icons for failures
File type validation correctly blocks executable files (.exe) with 'File extension not allowed' message
File size limit is enforced at 28MB with clear error message
Duplicate file handling offers both Keep and Replace options with clear explanations
Special characters in filenames (spaces, ampersand) are handled correctly
The drag-and-drop functionality UI is present - actual drag-and-drop from file system was tested via file input which uses the same underlying mechanism
Anti-forgery token validation is implemented in the FileUploadController as per code review (IFrameSupportedValidateAntiForgeryToken attribute)
Multipart upload is supported as seen in the FileUploadController code
The 'Decompress Zip Files' option is available for ZIP file handling
